coreAttributes.name: bell collar
coreAttributes.description: A leather collar, with a little bell attached to the front that gently rings with the movement of the wearer.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before fastening the bell collar around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] bell collar, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] bell collar, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] bell collar, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
